alert.note: Alert for Dodge; Telfair; Wilcox (Georgia) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Flood Warning issued January 15 at 11:42AM EST until further notice by NWS Atlanta
info.description: ...The Flood Warning continues for the following rivers in Georgia... Ocmulgee River at Abbeville affecting Dodge, Wilcox and Telfair Counties. ...FLOOD WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL FURTHER NOTICE... * WHAT...Minor flooding is occurring. * WHERE...Ocmulgee River at Abbeville. * WHEN...Until further notice. * IMPACTS...At 12 feet, Flood Stage is reached. Minor flooding of lowlands adjacent to the river begins. The water level reaches the top of the Abbeville boat ramp and also begins to flood the nearby park. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 10:45 AM EST Monday the stage was 12 feet. - Forecast...The river is expected to rise to a crest of 14 feet early Wednesday afternoon. - Flood stage is 12 feet. &&
info.instruction: Motorists should not attempt to drive around barricades or drive cars through flooded areas. Turn around, don`t drown when encountering flooded roads. Most flood deaths occur in vehicles. The next statement will be issued this evening at 1145 PM EST.
